sentences.sContent: Police came and took her gently aside and told her they would try to find the name of the morgue.
sentences.sContent_eng: Police came and took her gently aside and told her they would try to find the name of the morgue.
sentences.sCn: 警察温和地把她拉到了一边，告诉她他们会尽力寻找存放孩子遗体的太平间的名字。

sentences.sContent: "They just drink tea inside, they just throw the bodies on the floor with some ice, " he said of officials in the morgue.
sentences.sContent_eng: "They just drink tea inside, they just throw the bodies on the floor with some ice, " he said of officials in the morgue.
sentences.sCn: 谈到太平间的官员，他说：“那些人只是在里面喝喝茶，把尸体和冰块扔到地上就不管了。”

remMethod.val: mor(死) + gue → 停放死人的地方 → 停尸房， 太平间

trans.tranOther: a building or room, usually in a hospital, where dead bodies are kept until they are buried or  cremate d
